td.content: s:pt with moderate retrosternal chest pain, moderate heart burn, severe regurgitation and Stomach. she has had several such episodes over past 5 months. she is a f podiatrist aged 65 yrs. she drinks alcohol occasionally she denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 61 in, Weight 126 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 70, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 14, Patient appears anxious a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to gastroenterology.

td.content: s:a f podiatrist aged 65 ys presents with moderate retrosternal chest pain for 8 days. patient also reports moderate heart burn, severe regurgitation. o:Height 61 in, Weight 126 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 14, Patient appears anxious a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Lansoprazole - 30 mg po qd x 8 week.

s:a 65 YO F with C/O Neurological. she reports having no more than one drink a day she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life o:Height 62 in, Weight 129 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 15, B burgdorferi IgG Serum positive a:Paralysis p:administered Immune globulin - 400 mg/kg IV daily x 5 days, performed B burgdorferi IgG Serum, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:patient presents with mild nausea, mild heart burn and mild burning pain in the middle of the chest that usually occurs after eating or when lying down. These symptoms are present for about 4 weeks. she is a 65 year old f podiatrist. o:Height 62 in, Weight 130 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 97, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16, Chest = normal vesicular breathing, no crackles or wheezes a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed RANITIDINE - 150 mg po bid x 4 weeks, and ordered CBC.
